title: Drawing, "Spoons", 1825–50
medium: Pen, sepia, brush, gray water color
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: The handle terminates in the front with the head of a woman, framed above by a diadem and at the sides by volutes bordering the handle.  They support a festoon from which a garland is hanging to the upper part of the handle.
